page.title: 08Sea Birds - Ducks
page.content: 1. {Eider Ducks:}The intertidal flats form part of the wintering area for Eiders. The numbers exceed 10,000 about 15% of the British total. 2. {Red-breasted Merganser:}This is a fish eating duck, the drakes have an untidy dark green double crest on the head. 3. {Common Scoters: }These are brown ducks and black drakes. They are winter visitors diving for crabs and mussels. {Velvet Scoters}: There are a few Velvet Scoters amongst the Common Scoters the Ducks are brown with 2 white face patches. Drakes, black with a white spot near the eye.
